street_trees_2015.name: 2015 Street Tree Census
street_trees_2015.description: Complete inventory of all NYC street trees from 2015 census
street_trees_2015.use_case: Identify existing street trees, calculate canopy coverage, find gaps

block_planting.name: Block Planting
block_planting.description: Street tree planting records by block
block_planting.use_case: Track where trees have been planted, identify planting patterns

forest_restoration.name: Forest Restoration Tracking
forest_restoration.description: Tracking of work related to restoration and maintenance of native forests
forest_restoration.use_case: Identify forest restoration areas, reforestation sites

tree_contract_work.name: Tree Contract Work Details
tree_contract_work.description: Records of plant material and tree contract work
tree_contract_work.use_case: Tree species inventory, planting records, cost tracking

pseudo_lots.description: Pseudo tax lots created by DCP for addresses without DOF tax lots
